release.description: Require latest versions of PLDoc and PMD
release.action: Project POM file - require PLDoc version 1.3.11
Project POM file - require PMD version 5.0.3

release.description: Migrate to new Sourceforge format and Sonatype OSSRH releases
release.action: Project POM file - require PLdoc version 1.3.9
Project POM file - update to Sonatype OSS parent
Project POM file - update SCM locations for new Sourceforge project format
Incorporate PLDoc 1.3.3 changes - support "AT LOCAL" and "AT TIME ZONE (DBTIMEZONE|SESSIONTIMEZONE|literal|expression)" time zone clauses
Support directory command line parameter (-d) in Settings command-line parser
Use Settings.outputDirectory value when writing output file in PLDocCPDTask
Reverse engineer JJTree AST from PLDoc 1.3.2 and generate PMD PLSQL Language
Cut and Paste PLDoc Settings.java, etc. in order to generate a version of CPD (Cut and Paste detector- ironic eh?) that can run against source stored in databases.
